title: Point Reyes National Seashore: 2006
body: 2006 25th Annual Sand Sculpture Contest        Adult/Family Group 1st Place Award Winner: Entry #10: Dwarf Planet        The 25th Annual Sand Sculpture Contest at Drakes Beach was once again well attended with 74 sculptures entered. Over two thousand participants and observers showed up to enjoy a classic Point Reyes summer day of mild weather with overcast skies. Below are photo galleries of the sand sculptures entered in the 25th Annual Sand Sculpture Contest.                   2006 Sand Sculpture Contest Winners   17 Photos  2006 Sand Sculpture Contest Winners          2006 Adults' Group Category   36 Photos  2006 Sand Sculpture Contest Adult's Group Category photos          2006 Children's Group Category   13 Photos  2006 Sand Sculpture Contest Children's Group Category photos            2006 Children's Individual Category   7 Photos  2006 Sand Sculpture Contest Children's Individual Category photos                        2006 Sand Sculpture Award Results  Key: HM = Honorable Mention PC = People's Choice Awards RP = Best Use Of Recycled Plastic  Adult's Group Category    Award Sculpture Contestants   RP Marin Inorganic Kathleen Huntington and Eco Friendly Gardeners   PC African Watering Hole Extended Jones family   1st Dwarf Planet The Pinkava and Leaf Families   2nd Baby Dragon Morita/Schneider/Nardone   3rd Bunch of Rocks Castle The Bill Saugez family   HM Picnic Raider Paul Miller Group   HM Bye Bye Pluto The Roseville Crew     Children's Group Category    Award Sculpture Contestants   1st Into the Frying Pan Stewards and Friends   2nd Digging to China Mariah and Monica   3rd Seaweed Hole Marissa, Rachel, and Gaby     Children's Individual Category    Award Sculpture Contestants   1st The Little Mermaid Amelia   2nd Rachel's Palace Rachel   3rd Henry the Cool Structure Thomas    Sand Sculpture Contests Photo Galleries Top of Page
